geopolitics.title: A new front in the economic war: Lavrov accuses U.S. of targeting global energy control
geopolitics.description: Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov accuses the U.S. of seeking to dominate global energy supply routes through coercive measures. Lavrov cites U.S. actions against pipelines like Nord Stream and sanctions on Russian energy firms as evidence of this strategy. The comments highlight escalating tensions between the U.S. and BRICS nations over energy trade and financial [‚Ä¶]

geopolitics.title: Mark Cuban Faces 9-Figure Decision Over Mavs as Bidding War Awaits In Dallas
geopolitics.description: Almost a year after the Luka Doncic trade, Mark Cuban was approached to reestablish control within the Dallas Mavericks.

geopolitics.title: US Vice President Vance heads to Armenia, Azerbaijan to push peace, trade
geopolitics.description: By Lucy PapachristouTBILISI, Feb 9 (Reuters) - U.S. Vice President JD Vance will visit Armenia and Azerbaijan this week to push a Washington-brokered peace agreement that could transform energy and trade routes in the strategic South Caucasus region.His two-day trip to Armenia, which begins later on Monday, comes just six months after the Armenian and Azerbaijani leaders signed an agreement at the White House seen as the first step towards peace after nearly 40 years of war.

geopolitics.title: India Pulls Back From Russian Oil as U.S. Trade Deal Nears
geopolitics.description: Indian refiners are reducing purchases of Russian crude ahead of a U.S.-India trade deal, a shift that could tighten crude markets and support higher global oil prices amid intensifying Western sanctions on Moscow.

geopolitics.title: Trump: China's Xi to Visit US 'Toward the End of the Year'
geopolitics.description: President Donald Trump has said he will host Chinese leader Xi Jinping at the White House late this year, as the world's top two economies look to reset ties marred by a roiling trade war.

geopolitics.title: US Olympians speaking up about politics at home face backlash; Trump calls one ‚Äòa real Loser‚Äô
geopolitics.description: Support for the U.S. abroad has eroded as the Trump administration has pursued an aggressive posture on foreign policy, including punishing tariffs, military action in Venezuela and threats to invade Greenland.

geopolitics.title: D.C. lobbyists have been the biggest winners of Trump‚Äôs trade wars - The Washington Post
geopolitics.description: The biggest winner of a trade war is the swamp.

geopolitics.title: EU Escalates Oil Sanctions With Broad Ban on Shipping Services
geopolitics.description: The European Union is preparing to take a much bigger swing at Russia‚Äôs oil trade, and this time Brussels is aiming less at optics and more at the plumbing that actually keeps barrels moving.

crypto.title: Has Bitcoin Failed As A Store Of Value? No, It's Just Maturing, Grayscale Argues

crypto.title: Strategy‚Äôs Michael Saylor Says ‚ÄòWe Are Not Going To Be Selling‚Äô as Company Buys More Bitcoin
crypto.description: Strategy executive chair Michael Saylor said the company will continue to buy 'forever' even as its bitcoin purchases remain underwater.

crypto.title: Blockchain Analytics and the End of Anonymous Financial Crime

crypto.title: Ripple introduces Ethereum and Solana staking
crypto.description: Ripple's new capability through Figment aims to streamline ETH and SOL staking for institutional investors.

crypto.title: MicroStrategy Is Now Down $4.5 Billion On Its $54 Billion Bitcoin Investment: What Does This Mean For Investors?
crypto.description: Executive Chairman Michael Saylor doubled down on Bitcoin (BTC) earlier this week, announcing via social media that his company Strategy (MSTR) , formerly known as MicroStrategy, has purchased an additional 1,142 BTC for approximately $90 million at...

crypto.title: U.S. Needs To Pass Clarity Act To Clear Path For Bitcoin And Crypto Markets
crypto.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent recently pressed lawmakers to act on stalled crypto legislation, saying the United States must secure clear market structure rules before the end of the spring legislative window.

crypto.title: Bitcoin Trades Like Growth Stock, Not Gold: Grayscale
crypto.description: Bitcoin is behaving more like a high-risk growth asset than a safe-haven hedge, according to new Grayscale research tracking correlations with equities.

crypto.title: Interactive Brokers Adds Nano Bitcoin Futures Via Coinbase
crypto.description: Interactive Brokers now offers nano Bitcoin futures via Coinbase Derivatives, providing smaller, lower-risk, and perpetual-style contracts to broaden regulated crypto access for its clients.

commodities.title: Wall Street braces for more pain in the face of market rebound Friday
commodities.description: Recent action in the metals markets ‚Äî gold, silver and copper ‚Äî may also herald more violent price moves, JPMorgan said.

commodities.title: Precious metals, oil slide as global tensions ease; copper down
commodities.description: Prices of commodities, from silver and gold to crude oil and copper, dived on Thursday, as global tensions eased after a telephone call between the leaders of China and the United States, which is also set for talks with Iran this week.

commodities.title: ETF‚Äôs Jump Back into Silver & Gold Pushes through $5000! Will it last?
commodities.description: ETFs move back into silver as gold pushes through $5,000, with Phil Streible breaking down the price action on Metals Minute. Tune in before the bell.

commodities.description: ETFs move back into silver as gold pushes through $5,000, with Phil Streible breaking down the price action on Metals Minute. Tune in before the bell.

commodities.title: Stocks, gold, and silver steady after overnight volatility
commodities.description: The center of the action in markets was again precious metals, where momentum suddenly halted after gold‚Äôs price roughly doubled in 12 months.

commodities.title: Gold and Silver Price Crashes Not a Moment to Buy the Dip, Pros Say
commodities.description: Gold and silver crashed on Friday, but analysts caution that the dramatic declines might not be a moment to buy the dip in the precious metals.

commodities.title: Commodities Slump Rattles Markets As Gold, Silver, Oil Sell-Off Deepens
commodities.description: Gold prices slid about 9% to their lowest level in more than two weeks, while silver fell more than 13% after both metals hit record highs last week.

commodities.title: Slump in commodities rattles global markets
commodities.description: Commodities markets slumped on Monday, led by deep losses in gold, silver, oil and industrial metals, as a selloff ‚Äãunleashed by President Donald Trump's choice of Kevin Warsh for the next U.S. Fed chair sent precious metals tumbling for a second session.

ai_tech.title: Daiwa Upgrades Palantir Stock To Buy On Shift To Bigger AI Deals
ai_tech.description: Daiwa upgraded Palantir stock to buy on views the data analytics software maker is winning bigger artificial intelligence contracts.

ai_tech.title: Israel's FINQ launches US ETFs managed solely by AI
ai_tech.description: Israel fund manager FINQ said on Tuesday it was entering the U.S. Exchange-Traded Funds market with two funds that will be solely managed by artificial intelligence, a nascent sub-sector where so far AI has only been used as a supporting tool.

ai_tech.title: AI disruption fears create buying chance in US software stocks, strategists say
ai_tech.description: The severity of the pullback in software stocks in recent days, driven by fears of advances in artificial intelligence disrupting the industry, has created opportunities for investors to position for a rebound in higher-quality stocks, strategists at JP Morgan said.

ai_tech.title: Medicare Is Experimenting With Having Artificial Intelligence Review Claims - But There Are Risks
ai_tech.description: While cost-saving, some fear the measure could result in denied claims and lost care.

ai_tech.title: A.I. Personalizes the Internet but Takes Away Control
ai_tech.description: The relentless addition of artificial intelligence in popular apps raises questions about what‚Äôs at stake. The answer: the future of the internet and its lifeblood, digital advertising.

ai_tech.title: Mozilla's new AI strategy marks a return to its 'rebel alliance' roots
ai_tech.description: New browser controls that let users disable AI features point to a broader push against default-on artificial intelligence.

ai_tech.title: China enlists AI to sniff out corruption in public bidding
ai_tech.description: China wants to use artificial intelligence in public tendering and bidding to guard against backroom deals and corruption, according to guidelines released on Tuesday, just as President Xi Jinping's years-long corruption purge intensifies.

ai_tech.title: Michigan saw some of the highest job losses in the U.S. during January, report says
ai_tech.description: Dow Inc., headquartered in Michigan, said in late January it planned to cut jobs in a shift toward artificial intelligence and automation.
